A Year in Reflection, and Looking Ahead

2024 was a busy year for Reverie Studios! Fracture, set in the Eskhaton universe, was a huge success. Future Reverie larps will elaborate and expand on the Eskhaton setting.

Upcoming Events

In 2025 Reverie Studios is partnering with Chaos League to bring the North American run of the critically acclaimed Miskatonic University to Bryn Mawr in Philadelphia, PA. We are also working on a number of other projects, including a limited small-form larp: Convolution, an Eskhaton-set, mind-warping encounter in the drug-addled ’70s.

In 2026 Reverie will run a large-scale blockbuster event yet again! This project will either be a new run of Eskhaton, rebooted with new material, or a completely new project: ProGenus ‘84, about the birth of a science cult in the shadow of the Cold War.

Reverie Studios is also in final playtesting and review of a tabletop roleplaying game based on Eskhaton, where players take on the roles of cultists in the final days before the arrival of the apocalypse. Intended for lightweight, quick pick-up-and-play with narrative depth, the Eskhaton TTRPG is an exciting expansion of Reverie as a design studio.

Participate in the Community!

We primarily use Discord for communication and outreach. Join us in our community and learn more about our events!

Upcoming Events

Miskatonic University North America

ProGenus 1984

Experience a descent into the depths of cosmic horror in the shadow of the Cold War.

Convolution

Come seek. Come surrender. Come awaken. This is Convolution. Spring 2026.

Past Events

Fracture

A summer camp becomes a crucible for death and rebirth at the hands of mysterious cultists.

Saturnalia

Unchain the God of Liberty! A World of Darkness larp by Reverie Studios and By Night Studios. November 2022.

The Haunting of Gray Manor

Explore the world of the dead, and perhaps cross into it.

Reverie Presents

A showcase for smaller-scale larps, promoting the art form for those familiar as well as new to it.

Eskhaton

The apocalypse is coming and you’re invited to make it happen. Reverie’s blockbuster, elder god-infused larp about the lives of the things that go bump in the night.

A Cog in the Machine

In the midst of a cataclysmic event, a shadow government assumes control of the United States. What role will you play?

Dædalvs

The innovators at the Trondant Foundation invite you to an exclusive unboxing. Experience the cosmic disruption of realizing nobody’s in charge.

Seance Sessions

A renowned host, a collection of skeptics and believers, and some unanticipated additions. It’s going to be a night to remember.
